alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:56PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Meade, north central Custer, southeastern Lawrence and central Pennington Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 255 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of New Underwood to Custer State Park. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Summerset, Black Hawk, New Underwood, Johnson Siding, Hermosa, Keystone, Piedmont, Hisega, Silver City, Caputa, Hayward, Rockerville, Farmingdale, Pactola Reservoir, Mount Rushmore National Memorial and Rapid City Airport. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 46 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
